snippet: The case of Emanuel Yegutkin is among several involving Orthodox Jews that the Brooklyn district attorney, Charles J. Hynes, is prosecuting.
abstract: Former Brooklyn private school principal Emanuel Yegutkin is found guilty in State Supreme Court of 75 counts of sexual abuse, in a case involving three boys over the course of a decade; case is among a wave of sexual abuse cases involving Orthodox Jews that Brooklyn district attorney Charles J Hynes is prosecuting after decades in which such prosecutions were rare.
lead_paragraph: The case of Emanuel Yegutkin is among several involving Orthodox Jews that the Brooklyn district attorney, Charles J. Hynes, is prosecuting.

headline.seo: Ex-Principal in Brooklyn Convicted of Abusing Boys
headline.main: Ex-Principal Is Convicted of Sex Abuse
headline.print_headline: Ex-Principal Is Convicted Of Sex Abuse
